Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
